emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_map

Class DocumentTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • prefuse.data.tuple.AbstractTupleSet

            • emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_map.DocumentTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    prefuse.data.tuple.TupleSet

    public class DocumentTree
extends prefuse.data.Tree
    Responsibilitiies include representing a collection of documents as a prefuse-style Tree for visualization as a TreeMap.
